paragraphs.body: A wide range of weapons are found in the ${link_0}, varying in quality, size, and usage among the ${link_1}. Metal is the principal material used in the construction of most weapons.
paragraphs.text: A wide range of weapons are found in the World of Avatar, varying in quality, size, and usage among the four nations. Metal is the principal material used in the construction of most weapons.

paragraphs.body: Prior to the foundation of the ${link_0}, the ${link_1} was the most technologically advanced when it came to manufacturing weapons due to their initiation of and dominant role in the ${link_2}. The ${link_3} was the second most proficient due to the necessity of defending itself against the industrially superior Fire Nation, especially after the crumbling of the ${link_4}. Both the ${link_5} and Southern ${link_6} are capable of crafting their own weapons, which are often made of sharpened metal or animal parts such as skins and teeth.
paragraphs.text: Prior to the foundation of the United Republic of Nations, the Fire Nation was the most technologically advanced when it came to manufacturing weapons due to their initiation of and dominant role in the Hundred Year War. The Earth Kingdom was the second most proficient due to the necessity of defending itself against the industrially superior Fire Nation, especially after the crumbling of the Southern Water Tribe. Both the Northern and Southern Water Tribes are capable of crafting their own weapons, which are often made of sharpened metal or animal parts such as skins and teeth.

paragraphs.body: The invention of ${link_0} had a significant impact on weaponry usage and manufacturing. Since metalbenders could simply deform or otherwise defeat weapons from earlier time periods, people had to utilize other forms of fighting that did not involve metal-based weapons. The metalbenders' advantage against older types of weapons was annulled with the creation of a new range of unbendable, electrical ones.
paragraphs.text: The invention of metalbending had a significant impact on weaponry usage and manufacturing. Since metalbenders could simply deform or otherwise defeat weapons from earlier time periods, people had to utilize other forms of fighting that did not involve metal-based weapons. The metalbenders' advantage against older types of weapons was annulled with the creation of a new range of unbendable, electrical ones.
Aang used his glider to augment his airbending.

paragraphs.body: A ${link_0} can be used to amplify vibrations.
paragraphs.text: A jaw blade can be used to amplify vibrations.

paragraphs.body: Armored ostrich horses were used by the ${link_0}.
paragraphs.text: Armored ostrich horses were used by the military of the Earth Kingdom.

paragraphs.body: Surface-to-air rocks were used by the ${link_0} to protect the ${link_1} from intruders.
paragraphs.text: Surface-to-air rocks were used by the Royal Earthbender Guards to protect the Earth Kingdom Royal Palace from intruders.

paragraphs.body: Bato and Hakoda disguised in Fire Nation military armor.
paragraphs.text: Bato and Hakoda disguised in Fire Nation military armor.

paragraphs.body: The Guan Dao is a type of large, heavy pole weapon.
paragraphs.text: The Guan Dao is a type of large, heavy pole weapon.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} were one of several weapons utilized by ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Stilettos were one of several weapons utilized by Mai.

paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} used ${link_1} to render their opponents unconscious.
paragraphs.text: The Equalists used electrified gloves to render their opponents unconscious.

paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} used ${link_1} to obscure their opponents' vision.
paragraphs.text: The Equalists used smoke grenades to obscure their opponents' vision.

paragraphs.body: An armored ${link_0} prepares to help lead the invasion of the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: An armored Appa prepares to help lead the invasion of the Fire Nation.

source.title: Weaponry in the World of Avatar
